content: for personal or gifting use only this blanket measures about 29 across not including the little mouse heads and about 30 including the mouse heads there is a crochet diagram to help make the mouse head stitch as clear as possible the only sewing needed is to add the ears at the end enjoy your new mickey inspired baby blanket connect with me here 1 i do not charge for my patterns but if you would like to support my work you can tip me on venmo @thoseyellowthings 1 https //www flowcode com/page/thoseyellowthings
